You're told to go to some jerkoff's website and fill out forms for a "14 day free trial" of some product in order to get a "password" which will allegedly let you unzip what are described as .zip files mislabeled as .mp3 files...a track at a time. I repeat: THIS TORRENT IS SPAM.  Would all 601 seeders please stop seeding it? I have. I'd rather take the hit to my ratio than pass it on to innocent strangers.

Thanks trfkad. I don't know what original drama revolved around the MP format. All of these tracks came out in MP3 format, playable on my iTunes player AND MPCStar/TigerPlayer. Quality is just fine. Maybe the low softness of the 1st track threw some off as the entire audio quality but I took that as intentional, since the other tracks work fine.
